intents.name: product_inquiry
examples: What is the battery life of the headphones?
Is the material cotton or polyester?
How much does the smart watch weigh?
Can I use this charger with an iPhone?

intents.name: order_issue
examples: I haven't received my order yet.

intents.name: return_refund
examples: I want to return this item.
How do I get a refund?
Can I exchange this for a different size?
I need to send this back.

intents.name: unsupported
examples: What is the capital of France?
Write me a poem about cats.
